name: Happy New Year Clicker
description:
New Year's clicker with New Year's achievements!

There is no New Year's mood? Play the New Year's clicker! This game will be a good gift for you and your friends!

Your goal is to buy all the gifts for the new year! Each gift hides behind itself a heap of achievements!

                                                               Play, click, gift!

+ Special achievements to decorate the profile for the holidays!

Features:

- Simple clicker;

- New Year's music;

- New Year's achievements;

- Pleasant price;
Happy New year and Merry Christmas!
